Create wallet * The password can protect your private key and prove 
	 your identity * Nest do not store any passwords, nor can we retrieve 
	 them for you.Keep your password safe Set the 8~32 password Re-enter password I have agreed 《The User Service and Privacy Policy》 《Monetary Tips and User Agreements》 Import wallet
Password Enter password Cancel OK Back up the wallet Mnemonic words are the same as private keys. Your information is at risk of being stolen when connected to the Internet. Write mnemonic words by hand and keep them in a safe place When you forget your password or lose your private key, you can use mnemonic words to recover your wallet Backup
No screenshot Make sure that there is no one around and 
 no camera 
 No screenshots nor photos in case of 
 stolen I know Back up mnemonic words Copy your mnemonic words Mnemonic words are used to restore the wallet. It cannot 
 be retrieved if you forget them 
 Copy mnemonic words on the paper in order and keep 
 them well Next
Confirm mnemonic words Verify mnemonic words To ensure that your mnemonic words backups are correct, 
 click on mnemonic words in the transcription order Verification failed 
 Check the order of mnemonic words Reset Verification success Keep your mnemonic words well. It cannot 
 be retrieved if you forget them

 Do not save the Keystore file to your notepad、mailbox 、
 dropbox or chatting software, in case of risk Do not use network transmission Do not transfer the Keystore file through the network tool. If it 
 is obtained by hackers, it will cause irreparable damage 
 Offline devices are recommended, and you can transmit by

2、Whether the action succeeded or not, the Gas(fee) for deployment of contract will not be refunded
3、If the contract successfully dissolved, the mortgage assets would return to your wallet automatically
4、If there are investments prior confirmed before the contract successfully dissolved, the contract would remain in force ConfirmMnemonicAct Please keep your mnemonic words well. It cannot be retrieved if you forget them Add assets Confirm delete wallet English Language setting Recent transaction records Keystore scan cancel current password error Statement of gas(fee) 1.Gas will be directly deducted from your wallet correspondingly
2.Gas will be directly deducted from your wallet correspondingly. Make sure your wallet has enough balance to complete the operation Please choose currencies Please enter the amount %s Balance：%s Transaction succeed Transaction failed address error Transaction time - + executed Repay retrieved published dissolved terminated No investment contracts loan agreement not published yet invest ask for a loan Currently have %d Pieces of dynamic contract Expiration date retrieved date View all contracts All contracts contractCreateDate desc interestRate desc timeLimit asc Amount of investment assets ETH balance：%s No investable contract invested repayment paid by debtor Mortgage assets retrieved Address for debtors’ wallet waiting for repayment Creation time Expiration date Dissolution time Contract terminated Currently have %d Pieces of dynamic contract %s ETH %s Balance %s Statement of loan The calculation of maximum of loan for each mortgage assets is as follows:
Maximum amount of loan=current balance × discount rate × Average price of assets yesterday
Average price of assets yesterday is the average price of the mortgage assets exchanged to ETH the day before
 * All principle and interest should be repaid on prepayment Maximum amount of loan: %s ETH Maximum amount of loan: 0 ETH Loan ETH immediately Choose quantity of loan Choose loan rate Choose days of loan Average price of assets yesterday Mortgage amount Mortgage discount rate（%） Mortgage assets are converted into ETH Already read Creating contract Total payment Confirm and deploy contract Hash address Contract deploying Contract deployed succeeded Contract deployed failed Assets transferring Assets transferred failed investment succeeded Contract deployed succeeded Assets transferring Assets transferred failed investment succeeded statement of repayment In order to prevent the blocking of the Ethernet, we recommend that you should repay 24 hours in advance, once a breach occurred, NEST will not take any responsibilities of your loss Statement of repayment confirm repayment asset retrieving asset retrieved failed asset retrieved succeeded Paying mortgage assets View contract details Back Back and retry loan contract actual amount to the account address for transferring commission Statement of contract dissolution dissolution of contract 1、After the successful deployment of contract, you should pay Gas(fee) for dissolution of contract
2、Whether the action succeeded or not, the Gas(fee) for deployment of contract will not be refunded
3、If the contract successfully dissolved, the mortgage assets would return to your wallet automatically

About NEST Enter only 10 letters or numbers in English Import up to five wallets Wallet existed! Import / create a new wallet The main chain network is unstable. Please try again later NEST，Decentralized Digital Asset Mortgage and Loan Platform Please enter your private key Private key Invalid private key Export private key Please backup in a secure environment Please keep the private key data properly to ensure that there are no people and cameras around. No screenshots or photographs are allowed. It is only used in a safe environment. Once the private key is acquired by others, it will cause irreparable damage to your assets. Copy priavte key Publish to the market at the same time Dividend detail 1. Community earnings income comes from fees arising from loan contracts
2. The proceeds will be distributed on a snapshot every Friday
3.How revenue is calculated:
Personal dividend = NEST deposited / NEST total Circulation * Total Community income
4.The proceeds are available for a period of one day, and the overdue earnings are accounted for in the total community income for use in the next issue of the dividend Total community income for the current period Total Community Benefits
%s d %s h %s m %s s Countdown to dividend issuance NEST total Circulation NEST deposited My expected dividend Select an action Deposit Withdraw Deposit number Enter a number to deposited Authorized deposit amount Dividend rules Remaining collection time:%s d %s h %s m %s s NEST Balance: %s Withdraw numbers Enter a number to withdraw Withdraw NEST Authorized Income received ETH can be withdraw Withdraw successful Authorization successful,deposit now Income details available benefit Dividend not collected within a specified period of time will be credited to the next total community benefits Deposit NEST Available withdraw NEST The higher the proportion of NEST deposited in the community, the more dividend will be awarded Countdown to Dividend Countdown to Dividend Wallet existed!
